People hate being disagreed with, don't they? Me, I love it. It sets the dialectic in motion. Without it, we have stasis, boredom, death.

@crispriestley @jabberworks @NicoleBurstein  @holly Capitalism works through a system of rewards. Women are rewarded for not having kids.
@crispriestley @jabberworks @NicoleBurstein @TABwrite @holly In that capitalism rewards you for not having kids.
@crispriestley @jabberworks @NicoleBurstein @TABwrite @holly It suggests that rather than a pressure to have kids, the opposite is true, no?
@crispriestley @jabberworks @NicoleBurstein @TABwrite @holly Because I just don't see it. Women with kids do less well in careers.
@crispriestley @jabberworks @NicoleBurstein @TABwrite @holly Examples of a wider societal pressure on women to reproduce would shut me up.
@jabberworks @crispriestley @NicoleBurstein @TABwrite @holly … raise the stakes by suggesting someone is lying. Why would you do that?
@jabberworks @crispriestley @NicoleBurstein @TABwrite @holly Don't suspect lying. Just want evidence. Is that irrational? Odd of you to …

@jabberworks @NicoleBurstein @TABwrite @holly By who? If by your friends, ditch them. Or maybe I'm just living in a benign feminist bubble…
@jabberworks @NicoleBurstein @TABwrite @holly Women who don't have kids do better in their careers. Babies hold you back.
@jabberworks @NicoleBurstein @TABwrite @holly But apart from Twitter psychos, mums, etc, where is the societal pressure?
@NicoleBurstein @TABwrite @holly @jabberworks … my Dad really wanted me to be a doctor. But society couldn't give a fuck. Same with kids.
@NicoleBurstein @TABwrite @holly @jabberworks Sure there are family pressures. But that's different to a wider societal thing…
@NicoleBurstein @TABwrite @holly @jabberworks  I couldn't be more supportive of people doing what the hell they want with their bodies.

@jabberworks @TABwrite @holly … talk you into having kids. Mums, maybe. But actual friends?

@holly @TABwrite @jabberworks The internet is made of attention-craving psychotics. IRL has anyone tried to talk you into having a baby?
@TABwrite @jabberworks @holly I've never heard it. I think this is all a bit fake. Has the feel of a publicity grab.
@jabberworks @holly It seems rather odd- I've never heard anyone criticise a person for not wanting kids. Twitter crazies aren't real people
